channel.title: Request All Available Sensors (OBDII Compliant)
channel.description: Hey all, I've just finished wrapping up a simple polling and printing program that displayed all available PIDs as referenced here - https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/OBD-II_PIDs#Mode_1_PID_00 Code is available [here](https://github.com/egarl004/carloop) Heres an example screen grab of my available PIDs: Hope this helps someone!
